text: Loiron-Ruillé is a commune of 2,667 people (2017). It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Mayenne department in the northwest of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Loiron (the seat) and Ruillé-le-Gravelais.Arrêté préfectoral 18 November 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Mayenne
title: Loiron-Ruillé
